languages.text: "Пощады!" {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Леди-Навигатор{/g} прикрывает лицо обезображенными чешуйчатыми руками, на каждой из которых по лишнему пальцу со сросшимися фалангами. Ее одежды залиты кровью — большей частью ваших слуг, а из нагрудной пластины торчат несколько неразорвавшихся болтов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Пощады!" {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Леди-Навигатор{/g} прикрывает лицо обезображенными чешуйчатыми руками, на каждой из которых по лишнему пальцу со сросшимися фалангами. Ее одежды залиты кровью — большей частью ваших слуг, а из нагрудной пластины торчат несколько неразорвавшихся болтов.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Mercy!" {n}The Lady {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} covers her face with her disfigured scaly hands, each with an extra finger and conjoined phalangeal bones. Her clothes are covered in blood, mostly that of your servants, and several unexploded bolts are sticking out of her chest plate.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Пощады!" {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Леди-Навигатор{/g} прикрывает лицо обезображенными чешуйчатыми руками, на каждой из которых по лишнему пальцу со сросшимися фалангами. Ее одежды залиты кровью — большей частью ваших слуг, а из нагрудной пластины торчат несколько неразорвавшихся болтов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mercy!" {n}Lady Navigator covers her face with disfigured scaly hands, each with an extra finger and conjoined phalangeal bones. Her raiment is covered in blood, mostly that of your servants, and there are several unexploded bolts sticking out from her chest plate.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

Her clothes are covered in blood, mostly that of your servants, and several unexploded bolts are sticking out of her chest plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mercy!" {n}The Lady {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} covers her face with her disfigured scaly hands, each with an extra finger and conjoined phalangeal bones. Her clothes are covered in blood, mostly that of your servants, and several unexploded bolts are sticking out of her chest plate.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: “饶命啊！”{n}这位女性{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}用她长着鳞片、被损毁的手捂住了脸，她每只手上都多了一根手指，指骨也连在一起。她的衣服上沾满了鲜血，绝大部分是你仆人们的鲜血，胸甲上还插着几根尚未爆炸的爆矢。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mercy!" {n}The Lady {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} covers her face with her disfigured scaly hands, each with an extra finger and conjoined phalangeal bones. Her clothes are covered in blood, mostly that of your servants, and several unexploded bolts are sticking out of her chest plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “饶命啊！”{n}这位女性{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}用她长着鳞片、被损毁的手捂住了脸，她每只手上都多了一根手指，指骨也连在一起。她的衣服上沾满了鲜血，绝大部分是你仆人们的鲜血，胸甲上还插着几根尚未爆炸的爆矢。{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: «¡Piedad!» {n}La lady {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} se tapa la cara con deformes manos escamosas, cada una de las cuales tiene un dedo extra y huesos de falanges unidos. Tiene la ropa teñida de sangre, en su mayor parte de tus sirvientes, y varios disparos de bólter que no han explotado clavados en su coraza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mercy!" {n}The Lady {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} covers her face with her disfigured scaly hands, each with an extra finger and conjoined phalangeal bones. Her clothes are covered in blood, mostly that of your servants, and several unexploded bolts are sticking out of her chest plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Piedad!» {n}La lady {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} se tapa la cara con deformes manos escamosas, cada una de las cuales tiene un dedo extra y huesos de falanges unidos. Tiene la ropa teñida de sangre, en su mayor parte de tus sirvientes, y varios disparos de bólter que no han explotado clavados en su coraza.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: 「慈悲を！」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}は指が一本多く、節骨が結合した、醜いウロコ状の手で顔を覆う。その服は血にまみれており、その血の大半はあなたの使用人のものだ。そして、いくつかの不発ボルトが、彼女の胸当てにくっついていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mercy!" {n}The Lady {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} covers her face with her disfigured scaly hands, each with an extra finger and conjoined phalangeal bones. Her clothes are covered in blood, mostly that of your servants, and several unexploded bolts are sticking out of her chest plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「慈悲を！」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}は指が一本多く、節骨が結合した、醜いウロコ状の手で顔を覆う。その服は血にまみれており、その血の大半はあなたの使用人のものだ。そして、いくつかの不発ボルトが、彼女の胸当てにくっついていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Gnade!" {n}Der Lady {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} verbirgt ihr Gesicht mit entstellten Schuppenhänden, jeweils mit einem zusätzlichen Finger und verwachsenen Fingerknochen. Die Kleidung ist voller Blut, größtenteils von deinen Dienern, und in der Brustplatte stecken mehrere nicht explodierte Bolzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mercy!" {n}The Lady {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} covers her face with her disfigured scaly hands, each with an extra finger and conjoined phalangeal bones. Her clothes are covered in blood, mostly that of your servants, and several unexploded bolts are sticking out of her chest plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gnade!" {n}Der Lady {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} verbirgt sein Gesicht mit entstellten Schuppenhänden, jeweils mit einem zusätzlichen Finger und verwachsenen Fingerknochen. Die Kleidung ist voller Blut, größtenteils von deinen Dienern, und in der Brustplatte stecken mehrere nicht explodierte Bolzen.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: « Pitié ! » {n}La dame {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigatrice{/g} se couvre le visage de ses mains déformées et couvertes d'écailles, chacune disposant d'un doigt supplémentaire et d'os conjoints au niveau des phalanges. Ses vêtements sont maculés de sang, principalement celui de vos serviteurs, et des projectiles intacts saillent de sa cuirasse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mercy!" {n}The Lady {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} covers her face with her disfigured scaly hands, each with an extra finger and conjoined phalangeal bones. Her clothes are covered in blood, mostly that of your servants, and several unexploded bolts are sticking out of her chest plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pitié ! » {n}La dame {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigatrice{/g} se couvre le visage de ses mains déformées et couvertes d'écailles, chacune disposant d'un doigt supplémentaire et d'os conjoints au niveau des phalanges. Ses vêtements sont maculés de sang, principalement celui de vos serviteurs, et des carreaux intacts saillent de sa cuirasse.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Merhamet!" {n}Leydi {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}; asıl şeklini kaybetmiş, fazladan bir parmağa ve birleşmiş parmak kemiklerine sahip elleriyle yüzünü kapatıyor. Giysileri, çoğu senin hizmetkârlarına ait kanlarla kaplı; göğüs zırhı ise birtakım patlamamış fişekleri etrafa saçıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mercy!" {n}The Lady {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} covers her face with her disfigured scaly hands, each with an extra finger and conjoined phalangeal bones. Her clothes are covered in blood, mostly that of your servants, and several unexploded bolts are sticking out of her chest plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Merhamet!" {n}Leydi {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} asıl şeklini kaybetmiş, ekstra bir parmağa ve birleşmiş parmak kemiklerine sahip elleriyle yüzünü kapatıyor. Giysileri, çoğu senin hizmetkârlarına ait kanlarla kaplı ve göğüs zırhında bazı patlamamış fişekler bulunuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader
